abstract.t: This document introduces an WiBro, Wireless Broadband, network based on IEEE 802.16 technology. IEEE 802.16 are air interface specifiction for fixed and mobile broadband wireless system. WiBro is one of the profiles of IEEE 802.16. It depicts network architecture based on trial service and specifies frame format for reference point based on network architecture. It describes evolution of IPv6 deployment over IEEE 802.16 network with three phases. It lists issues of improvement for IP over IEEE 802.16 and IPv6 evolution.
